allow: Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o ConnectTimeout=10 root@104.248.80.247 "echo ''SSH Connection successful!'' && uname -a")

Bash(ssh root@104.248.80.247 "node -v 2>/dev/null || echo ''Node not installed''; npm -v 2>/dev/null || echo ''npm not installed''; which git 2>/dev/null || echo ''git not installed''; systemctl is-active postgresql 2>/dev/null || echo ''PostgreSQL not running''")
Bash(ssh root@104.248.80.247 "apt install -y git curl build-essential software-properties-common")
Bash(ssh root@104.248.80.247 "curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_20.x | bash - && apt install -y nodejs && node -v && npm -v")
Bash(ssh root@104.248.80.247 "apt install -y postgresql postgresql-contrib && systemctl start postgresql && systemctl enable postgresql && systemctl status postgresql --no-pager")
Bash(ssh root@104.248.80.247 "sudo -u postgres psql -c ""CREATE USER omnex_user WITH PASSWORD ''JHkS2q4N9HbLqKO5KnqPQ'';""")

Bash(ssh root@104.248.80.247 "sudo -u postgres psql -c ""CREATE DATABASE omnex_core OWNER omnex_user;"" && sudo -u postgres psql -c ""CREATE DATABASE tenant_omnexcore_2025 OWNER omnex_user;"" && sudo -u postgres psql -c ""GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE omnex_core TO omnex_user;"" && sudo -u postgres psql -c ""GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE tenant_omnexcore_2025 TO omnex_user;""")

Bash(ssh root@104.248.80.247 "sudo -u postgres psql -d omnex_core -c ""GRANT ALL ON SCHEMA public TO omnex_user;"" && sudo -u postgres psql -d tenant_omnexcore_2025 -c ""GRANT ALL ON SCHEMA public TO omnex_user;""")
Bash(ssh root@104.248.80.247 "npm install -g pm2 && pm2 -v && mkdir -p /var/log/pm2")
Bash("C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -h localhost -U postgres -d omnex_core -c "SELECT id, name, slug, status, ""currentDb"" FROM ""Tenant"";")
Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -h localhost -U postgres -d tenant_omnexcore_2025 -c "SELECT id, name, email, role, status FROM ""User"" ORDER BY role, name LIMIT 20;")

Bash(sshpass -p 'onWind.1235APP' ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@104.248.80.247 "cd /var/www/omnex-core && git pull origin main")

Bash(expect -c '
spawn ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@104.248.80.247 ""cd /var/www/omnex-core && git pull origin main""
expect ""password:""
send ""onWind.1235APP\r""
expect eof
')
Bash(sshpass -p 'Onwind.1235APP' ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@146.190.224.121 "echo ''SSH bağlantısı başarılı!'' && uptime")

Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Content ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub | Set-Clipboard; Write-Host ''SSH key panoya kopyalandı''")

Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o ConnectTimeout=10 root@146.190.224.121 "echo ''Şifresiz bağlantı başarılı!'' && uptime")
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o ConnectTimeout=10 root@146.190.224.121 "echo ''SSH bağlantısı başarılı!'' && uptime && uname -a")

Bash(ssh -o ConnectTimeout=10 root@146.190.224.121 "sudo -u postgres psql -c ""GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE omnex_core TO omnex_user;"" && sudo -u postgres psql -d omnex_core -c ""GRANT ALL ON SCHEMA public TO omnex_user;"" && sudo -u postgres psql -d omnex_core -c ""GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ALL TABLES IN SCHEMA public TO omnex_user;"" && sudo -u postgres psql -d omnex_core -c ""GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ALL SEQUENCES IN SCHEMA public TO omnex_user;"" && echo ''Permissions granted successfully''")
